function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Enactment of changes to regulations governing interiors to align with social distancing recommendations","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable death data","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited space and lack of dedicated entry zones for managing outdoor to indoor transitions may lead to an increased risk of bringing contaminants into the home.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Iterative collaboration and sharing of the critical commentary may facilitate the exchange of ideas and insights but also increase the risk of exposure to the virus during in-person discussions or gatherings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Surface-based contagions from behaviors like surface-touching and hand-sanitizing may lead to the spread of contagious diseases through contact with contaminated surfaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New research streams related to workforce-related issues, project and workplace considerations, procurement and supply chain implications, and contractual, legal, and insurance aspects.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of regulations for telehealth services","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents seeking personalized adaptation of apartments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on mechanical ventilation and artificial environmental conditions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on the consequences of covid-19 on the us construction industry.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technical performance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contagion-related behaviours like breathing, sneezing, and coughing can lead to the spread of air-based contagions in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost of implementing 6g technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underutilized smart solutions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation systems in healthcare facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decay rate of sars-cov-2 in the environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of amplified products leading to cross-contamination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population densities in urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of rapid spread and cross-sectorial impact of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health indicators missing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for cultural differences in social distancing, energy burden, access to technology, and healthy built-home environments may lead to biased findings.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of public health impact in mobility simulation for activity data","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure of workers and patients to germ-eliminating devices in hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relative policy neglect for large-scale implementation of participatory approaches","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate relief measures for entrepreneurs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate inference of occupation levels and transmission risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on herd immunity as a control strategy for contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concentration of malaria-related deaths in sub-saharan africa","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic instability leading to higher medical and health risks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender differences in exercise habits","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social support","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gentrifying landscapes and heavily populated urban areas may have higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recoding variables may introduce bias and distort the true impact of covid-19 on individual health and well-being.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of costs to international dollars using an online conversion tool","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in data dissemination","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alignment with corporate strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of ai and ml for disease prediction and diagnosis may lead to biases in decision-making and inaccurate assessments, impacting treatment and resource allocation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unexplored tradeoffs among the dimensions of resilience","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fear of covid-19 transmission to families and friends due to close social distance within the in-group, leading to protective measures and enforced quarantine measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus survival on surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inflexible hospital designs","category":"Infrastructure
